attributes.action: Create a UN or British led task force to improve the situation in the Darfur and Chad border region
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People are dying every day and no-one is helping them. Support a just action!

rejection.details: Thanks but there is a similar petition open already http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Genocide-in-Chad/ If you still wish to lodge your petition, please re-submit.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
